objects.text:

• Rose Gold Pink Design

• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
The banner is divided into four quadrants with a diagonally segmented background of soft pink tones. The top-left features two bold headline text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") emphasizing the product's glamour, followed by a subheading ("subheading") that provides a brief highlight. The top-right quadrant displays the product image ("product_image"): a pair of elegant circle-shaped stud earrings with rose gold and diamond-like stones. The bottom-left quadrant includes a vertical list ("description") of key features and a large, bold price tag ("price"). Below it is a prominent call-to-action button ("cta") with a matching colored rounded rectangle ("cta_background"). Abstract lines and transparent pink shapes enhance the visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Peach (#FFE4E1)
- Light Pink (#FFC0CB)
- Baby Pink (#FFB6C1)
- Lavender Blush (#FFF0F5)
- Rosewood (#8B3A62)
- Dusty Rose (#C85A7A)
- Sweet Pink (#F5A9B8)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings, combining a gentle rose gold (#F7AFA3) base with soft blush pink (#F9C6C3) accents in teardrop floral motifs. Brilliant white diamonds (#FFFFFF) and crystal-clear gems (#E6E6E6) create a luminous contrast, enhancing the overall sparkle. The rose gold hue weaves seamlessly through the design, blending with the light pink while serving as a warm backdrop for the cooler diamond tones. This harmonious interplay of colors ensures the earrings appear vibrant and luxurious. An advertisement banner for this product would be well-suited with a palette including: rose gold, blush pink, pristine white, and silver tones.
